JobFullDesc:
Become a Part of the NIKE, Inc. Team

NIKE, Inc. does more than outfit the world's best athletes. It is a place to explore potential, obliterate boundaries and push out the edges of what can be. The company looks for people who can grow, think, dream and create. Its culture thrives by embracing diversity and rewarding imagination. The brand seeks achievers, leaders and visionaries. At Nike, it’s about each person bringing skills and passion to a challenging and constantly evolving game.
Nike is no ordinary company, and we are no ordinary Procurement team. Our Procurement team helps Nike win by leveraging our suppliers and our scale. We partner with our stakeholders to drive value. We challenge the status quo and bring innovative thinking. We use facts to create leverage. We are motivated by results, not by process. And we act as one team across the globe. Our work spans the entire company, giving our team a unique Nike, Inc. viewpoint. Are you a high-energy, self-motivated team player that wants to work for a company driven by innovation and excitement? If yes, we want to get to know you!
 

WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR

At NIKE Procurement, we are dedicated to revolutionizing how the world’s leading sports brand does business with its suppliers and partners!
We’re looking for a self-starter. This person will lead a team of hardworking, high caliber individuals and will demonstrate a strong record of winning hearts and minds of their teams through mentoring and support, encouraging people to innovate, and taking calculated risks - a real Leader!
In this role, a strategic mentality is key - a person who can see possibilities and translate them into breakthrough sourcing strategies for in the area of Technology & Services Procurement for EMEA region.
The ideal candidate should have comprehensive procurement category management expertise in order to provide thought leadership and formulate strategic sourcing approaches that optimizes spend across demand, supply and process levers.
Strong communications skills and story-telling ability will be essential to effectively influencing within a global matrix organization.

 

WHAT YOU WILL WORK ON

In this critical role you are in charge for partnering with Senior business leaders and Global Procurement colleagues to deliver sourcing strategies that drive rive the following value proposition:

Capacity for Growth;
Speed;
Innovation;
Risk mitigation; and
Increased connection with the consumer.

A typical week would focus on planning and prioritizing initiatives with your team, developing and socializing these plans with key-stakeholders, coaching and mentoring to effectively lead through others.

 

WHO YOU WILL WORK WITH

Within our NIKE Matrix organization, you will managing the EMEA Technology & Services procurement team and partnering with the associated Global Procurement Team. You will be reporting to the EMEA Senior Director of Procurement and working closely with your key-stakeholder with the Technology, Workplace Design + Connectivity and Human Resources teams.
